channel.title: The Difference
channel.description:
Note to moderators: I posted this, and then I didn't expect it to be visible yet, but it already appeared publicly. If I did something wrong, let me know, don't just throw infractions at me.
[size=30pt]LOOKING FOR PEOPLE WHO WISH TO JOIN THIS PROJECT. IF INTERESTED, EMAIL siggi@imdifferent.co.cc[/size]
[size=18pt]I have started a new project The Difference 317 Server. So far, I've only completed the basics of the game server, which is multiple world support, cross-world private chatting, and a very simple world selection dialog for the client.
Multiple world support allows for servers to run anywhere in the world, it doesn't have to be all on one computer using different port numbers for each world. Right now, logging into a game world will cause the game world to send a request to the central server to process the login, and then the central server sends the account data back if the login is successful.[/size]
[size=13pt][u][b]World Selection[/b][/u][/size] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=538189.0;attach=20797;image[/img] [size=13pt][u][b]Cross-World Private Chatting[/b][/u][/size] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=538189.0;attach=20799;image[/img]
[size=18pt]The server has a very simple GUI. Even though it has a GUI, it will also be compatible with headless environments, such as a Linux VPS server without the GNOME desktop environment installed, and unlike other servers with GUIs, it will not crash if it is unable to put a GUI on-screen.[/size]
[size=13pt][u][b]The Server's GUI[/b][/u][/size] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=538189.0;attach=20801;image[/img]
[size=18pt]I need people who are excellent in Java coding, and have experience with 317 servers to help out with this server. If you're interested in joining, leave me a message.[/size]
[size=13pt][u][b]Definition of crowns[/b][/u][/size] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=538189.0;attach=20795;image[/img]

item.title: The Difference
item.dc:creator: @The_Difference The Difference
item.description:
@The_Difference wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:13, topic:435468”][quote author=The Difference link=topic=538189.msg3937657#msg3937657 date=1331162954]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=538189.msg3937640#msg3937640 date=1331162229]

I am not seeing how this is “original” sorry. Having more than one vps(and in different locations) just means more work on your part.

These do not need to be VPS servers. These can be hosted by anyone. Of course I’m not going to buy a hundred VPS servers and do it all myself, only someone out of his mind would do that.

I just give extra credit to people who help by hosting a server on their computer, as this may decrease lag for people who now have a server closer to them.
[/quote]so… then what your saying is you have to worry about somebody deciding to be an ass and not host anymore. Then you will get complaints from players about" the german world went down! "

Unless your server is going to get majorly large I highly doubt it will be needed at all.

Not to mention I was referring to the point it isn’t an original idea by anything…Runescape and almost every other large scale game you see out there has worlds in such a way.

If you don’t have anything good to say, my love and powerful jealous hero, then please stop replying to this thread.
[/quote]I don’t see how giving you a “fair warning” of others actions is “not nice” but sure whatever have fun.[/quote]

I didn’t say “not nice,” and “nice” has a different definition from “good.” Check the dictionary if you don’t believe me. However it is not nice to cause trouble for other peoples projects just for the sake of it, and you’re just wasting your time and my time, so get off this thread. Believe me, I take trouble makers seriously, and if I were able to do anything damaging to you, and you as a trouble maker, by taking lawful actions, I will take every chance I can to do it.

Read full topic

item.title: The Difference
item.dc:creator: @The_Difference The Difference
item.description:
@The_Difference wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:2, topic:435468”]This looks great! Are all of those features original?

Good luck![/quote]

All features are original, all crowns are customized by me, except the moderator crown which I left as default.

I haven’t seen anything else anywhere else. Maybe some servers had multiple world support, but all the worlds run on the same computer, rather than different places around the world, and did not have cross-world private chat support. As you could see in the screenshot, one server was in North America, and another server was in Asia.

Read full topic

[size=30pt]LOOKING FOR PEOPLE WHO WISH TO JOIN THIS PROJECT. IF INTERESTED, EMAIL siggi@imdifferent.co.cc[/size]

[size=18pt]I have started a new project The Difference 317 Server.

Right now, logging into a game world will cause the game world to send a request to the central server to process the login, and then the central server sends the account data back if the login is successful.[/size]

[size=13pt]World Selection[/size]

[size=13pt]Cross-World Private Chatting[/size]

[size=18pt]The server has a very simple GUI. Even though it has a GUI, it will also be compatible with headless environments, such as a Linux VPS server without the GNOME desktop environment installed, and unlike other servers with GUIs, it will not crash if it is unable to put a GUI on-screen.[/size]

[size=13pt]The Server’s GUI[/size]
